Package io.github.thecsdev.betterstats.api.util.io

Interface IEditableStatsProvider

All Superinterfaces:
IStatsProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
OtherClientPlayerStatsProvider, RAMStatsProvider
public interface IEditableStatsProvider extends IStatsProvider
An IStatsProvider whose statistics can be edited.

    • setAll

      default void setAll(RAMStatsProvider from) throws NullPointerException
      Copies all statistics present in another RAMStatsProvider, and pastes them into this IEditableStatsProvider, overriding existing statistics in the process.
      Parameters:
      from - The RAMStatsProvider to copy stats from.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - If the argument is null.
